name: Explosion
description: Sometimes, the projectiles become huge upon killing an enemy.

name: Speed Up
description: Improves the fire rate of the tower.

name: Max combo
description: Adds the current combo to tower damage.

name: Lucky trigger
description: When firing, the tower sometimes fire an additonal projectile. Scales with number of projectiles.

name: Projectiles Up
description: Increase the number of projectiles fired by the tower.
